alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 12:58AM CDT until April 27 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Western Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Newton County in southeastern Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1258 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Devils Pocket, or near Deweyville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Deweyville, Starks, Moss Bluff, Devils Pocket, Lunita, Buhler, Edgerly and Carlyss. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 9 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
